Text: RE Giuseppe PaleologoVince Please let me know if he needs any additional information etc and I will be happy to discuss it with him Molly Original Message From Kaminski Vince J Sent Thursday June PM To Magee Molly Subject RE Giuseppe Paleologo Molly He went to Italy for a month I shall call him today Vince Original Message From Magee Molly Sent Wednesday June PM To Kaminski Vince J Cc Labbe Anne Subject Giuseppe Paleologo Vince Just wondering if you had any information concerning Giuseppe We had sent him an offer letter on but have not heard back from him at all nor has he returned the signed offer I have sent him several emails at his Stanford email address but have not received a reply Any suggestions or information Thanks for your help Molly x

Giuseppe Paleologo Cc Just wondering if you had any information concerning Giuseppe We had sent him an offer letter on but have not heard back from him at all nor has he returned the signed offer I have sent him several emails at his Stanford email address but have not received a reply Any suggestions or information Thanks for your help Molly x

Loan Papers Cc that each of you has just said FINALLY and I do apologize for the delay As I explained to you earlier this week Ken we wouldnt want to have you actually sign the papers until very close to your last day at Enron because the interest will run from the date of your signature Please take a look at the document and call me with any questions I will need to know the exact loan amount to complete the loan document and will have to ask Legal to sign off before its executed Thanks Molly x
Any InterestI received this resume today Would you take a look at it and let me know if you would be interested in talking with him Thanks Molly x
